indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX brain_dumps_pkey ON public.brain_dumps USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_brain_dumps_latest_active ON public.brain_dumps USING btree (user_id, updated_at DESC) WHERE (status = ANY (ARRAY['pending'::brain_dump_status, 'parsed'::brain_dump_status]))
CREATE INDEX idx_brain_dumps_status_user ON public.brain_dumps USING btree (user_id, status, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_brain_dumps_user_status ON public.brain_dumps USING btree (user_id, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_projects_id ON public.projects USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_projects_updated_at ON public.projects USING btree (updated_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX projects_pkey ON public.projects USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_recurring_instances_status ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (status) WHERE (status <> 'completed'::text)
CREATE INDEX idx_recurring_instances_task ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (task_id, instance_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_recurring_instances_user_date ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (user_id, instance_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_recurring_task_instances_task_id ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (task_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX recurring_task_instances_pkey ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX recurring_task_instances_task_id_instance_date_key ON public.recurring_task_instances USING btree (task_id, instance_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_deleted_at ON public.tasks USING btree (deleted_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_outdated ON public.tasks USING btree (outdated)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_parent_task_id ON public.tasks USING btree (parent_task_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_dates ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, start_date, status) WHERE (deleted_at IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_id ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_not_outdated ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, outdated)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_outdated ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, outdated)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_status ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_project_updated ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, updated_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_start_date ON public.tasks USING btree (start_date) WHERE ((start_date IS NOT NULL) AND (outdated = false))
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_synthesis ON public.tasks USING btree (project_id, user_id, status) WHERE (deleted_at IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_updated_at ON public.tasks USING btree (updated_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_user_id ON public.tasks USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_tasks_user_outdated ON public.tasks USING btree (user_id, outdated)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX tasks_pkey ON public.tasks USING btree (id)
